Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: It is unclear to me that we should be maintaining so many approaches to downloading the images. I think we should take stock and have a single approach.

Action.author: weeds
Action.body: Chris- is this really a high level defect then- should it be moved to medium? Unclear of what we should do here, please advz.

Action.author: nnao
Action.body: Do I need to change this JIRA that deleting make release in Makefile.
